cart.title: Your Cart
cart.emptyDescription: Add some delicious items to get started
cart.orderingDescription: Online payment is available via Mollie.

menu.emptyDescription: This restaurant is still setting up their menu. Check back later!

errors.couldNotLoadRestaurant: We couldn't load this restaurant. Please try again.
errors.restaurantNotFoundDescription: The restaurant you're looking for doesn't exist or is no longer available.
errors.storeUnavailableDescription: Online ordering is taking a short break. Please check back soon or visit us in person.

ordering.title: Checkout
ordering.emailRequired: Email is required for online payment
ordering.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

paymentMethods.onlineDescription: Pay securely with card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay

ordering.invalidCartItems: Your cart contains invalid items. Please add items again.
ordering.preOrderMessage: You can pre-order for our upcoming opening times. Select a pickup time below.
ordering.errorLoadingSlots: Failed to load available times. Please try again.
ordering.noSlotsAvailable: No pickup times available at the moment.

return.pleaseWait: Please wait while we confirm your payment...
return.sessionExpired: Your payment session has expired. Please try again.
return.tryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again.

payment.title: Complete Payment
payment.description: You'll be redirected to our secure payment page to complete your order.
payment.error: Failed to create payment. Please try again.
payment.pleaseWait: You'll be redirected to the secure payment page shortly.

confirmation.title: Order Received!
confirmation.subtitle: Your order has been placed successfully
confirmation.instructions: Please wait for your order to be prepared. We'll call your name when it's ready.
